University of Toronto Mississauga: Lots of depressed first year students. Avoid if you can
University of Toronto St George: Potentially toxic students sabotaging each other in order to make CS POST. Worse than Mississauga, avoid at all costs.
Pearson Airport: Expensive food, somewhat ok area, very busy.
CN Tower: Food is overpriced, mainly go there for the view. Safety wise, its downtown toronto.
Ontario Science Center: Actually really nice place! Not unsafe at all unless you get lost as a 7 year old. Good place to go with anyone!
